quest.name: Eggsistential Crisis
journal:
Nonotta needs your assistance to resolve an unforeseen spriggan problem.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

A rock-riding spriggan, unknown to and unendorsed by Hatching–tide organizers, has taken to startling folk in the forest. The creature was last seen making for the city; should it cause a commotion there, the blame is like to fall upon the festival. Nonotta bids you return with her to Gridania in order to alert Jihli at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Jihli informs you that the spriggan has indeed come to Gridania and begun making mischief, startling townsfolk indiscriminately. At this rate, the Wood Wailers may be dispatched to hunt down the unwelcomed intruder. Dismayed by the prospect of violence, Jihli is determined to resolve the matter peacefully, and bids you reach out to the spriggan. Find the creature at Greatloam Growery and soothe him.

You find the spriggan, one Riggy, greatly agitated, but succeed in calming him down. From what you can make of his limited vocabulary, the creature was merely mimicking your actions in hopes of making people happy. Jihli invites Riggy to be an official part of the festival, and together they head back to Hyrstmill. Make your own way there and speak with Nonotta to learn what manner of plans they have in store.

According to Nonotta, Riggy is happily playing out in the forest. Having had his fill of startling, the spriggan now wishes to be startled for a change, and it falls to you to deal the shocks. Speak with Motte when you are ready to ride the egg and set about your task.

Motte helps you onto eggback and furnishes you further instructions. While on eggback, search for Riggy at his hiding place and startle him with the shockobo.

※Speak with Motte at Hyrstmill to ride the eggshilaration system.

You find and startle Riggy, much to his delight. Keen for another shock, the spriggan goes off to hide himself again. While on eggback, search for Riggy at his next hiding place and startle him with the shockobo.

※Speak with Motte at Hyrstmill to ride the eggshilaration system.

You find and startle Riggy again, and again the spriggan goes off to hide himself. While on eggback, search for Riggy at his last hiding place and startle him with the shockobo.

※Speak with Motte at Hyrstmill to ride the eggshilaration system.

You find and startle Riggy for the third and last time. Though the spriggan is sad that the fun must end, he goes off well satisfied. Your task now complete, return to Hyrstmill and present your three hard-earned shock eggs to Nonotta.

You show Nonotta your haul of shock eggs, after which Riggy arrives with other festival helpers in tow. Reflecting upon recent events, Jihli experiences an epiphany: the gemstone in her dream is none other than Riggy, who rode atop his magnificent rock and spread dazzling smiles to those around him. Grateful for your part in making her vision a reality, she spontaneously decides to gift you the eggshilaration system. Loath to part with her creation, Nonotta inadvertently reveals its secret, but much to her surprise, the truth impresses rather than upsets Jihli. After a tender moment, she undergoes a change of heart and gives you her blessing to be the proud owner of a hovering egg. May it bear you to all you have ever dreamed.
objectives: Speak with Jihli Aliapoh in Gridania.
Ride the eggshilaration system and launch the shockobo at Riggy.
Deliver the shock eggs to Nonotta.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: You'll help us? I knew we could depend on you, adventurer. Thank you!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Should the spriggan cause a commotion in the city, the blame would inevitably fall upon our festival. In the worst case scenario, the authorities might permanently ban it. We cannot allow that to happen!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Let us make haste to Gridania. Jihli needs to be alerted...assuming all hells haven't already broken loose.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename! Nonotta has told me everything.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: As she had feared, a rock-riding spriggan appeared in the city and began startling hapless citizens, one after another. It's been utter chaos, and everyone thinks it's all part of Hatching–tide.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: It didn't take long for word to reach the Wood Wailers, who are none too pleased. They are threatening to take swift and decisive action, which is to say hunt down the intruder. It must not come to violence, Forename. Nay, we must find a peaceful solution─reach out to the spriggan somehow.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Riggy is his name, and he's taken up residence at Greatloam Growery. By all accounts, he has become extremely agitated. We must soothe him somehow before the situation deteriorates. With me, Forename.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: There you are! I've informed Jihli of our spriggan problem, and she has a plan. Hurry and have it from her.

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Riggy is confuse! Confuse make fear! Fear make angry! Aaangryyy!

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Riggy no bad spriggy! Riggy only watchy! Watchy copyyy!

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: You ride biggy egg! Riggy ride biggy rock! Same! Saaaaaame!

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: You make people laugh! Laugh make happy! Happy good! Riggy want make happy!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: It would seem Riggy was mimicking you. He simply wished to be a part of Hatching–tide.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Well, our festival is open to one and all, and we'd all be richer for Riggy's presence. Don't you agree?

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Riggy join! Joooin! Make much happyyy!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Then it's official! Just one thing, though: the city is a little too crowded for the fun we have in store. Let's take the revelry over to Hyrstmill.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: We'll go on ahead to make preparations. Please join us when you are ready!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Upset as Riggy is, we can't reach out to him. You'll have to soothe him first.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Oh dear, Riggy is in quite a tizzy... Could you try and soothe him, Forename?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Ah, glad you could join us! With help from some volunteers, I'm pleased to report that Riggy is happily playing out in the forest.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: At first he was content to do the startling, but after a while he said that he wanted to be startled for a change.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: So we took him to a secluded place, the better to know the thrill of a good shock. And who better to deal that shock than you?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Your task is to search for Riggy in the Twelveswood. And when you find him, give him such a shock as he'll never forget!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: You'll earn shock eggs for your troubles, of course; we've given some to Riggy to give to you. Together with those you received earlier, you ought to have enough for a splendid prize!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: As before, Motte yonder will help you onto the eggshilaration system. Happy startling!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Thank you for coming, Forename. We have Riggy taking part in the celebration, and we could use your help. Pray speak with Nonotta for the details.

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: Nonotta has informed me of the situation. Let's get you on the egg, shall we?

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: Now, Riggy has three shock eggs. If you want them all, you'll need to startle him not once, not twice, but thrice. When you've finished, return here and report to Nonotta.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Motte yonder will help you onto the eggshilaration system; let her know when you are ready.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I trust Nonotta has filled you in on your role. Pray speak with Motte when you're ready to ride the egg.

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Spriggyyy! You find Riggy! Very shocky funnyyy! Hee hee hee!

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Riggy give egg! Egg for youuu! Now Riggy hide! Hide agaaain!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: You're not on the egg? Riggy is out there, eagerly awaiting a good shock. Let's not keep the little fellow waiting.

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Riggy want shock! You are shooock! No shocky, no findy! No findy, no eggyyy!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: You seem to have mislaid the egg, adventurer. Pun intended. Talk to Motte, and she'll help you back on it.

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: Oh? Fell off the egg, did you? Never you mind─given the shape, it's bound to happen. Here, let me help you back on.

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Spriggyyy! You find Riggy! Find agaaain! Riggy give egg! Egg for youuu!

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Next egg last egg! Laaaaaast! Riggy hide! Hide gooooood! You no find Riggy!

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Spriggyyy! You find Riggy! Riggy hide good! But you find gooder!

dialogue.name: STONESPRIGGAN02423
dialogue.text: Riggy give egg! Egg for youuu! Riggy give thank! Thank for shocky funny!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Ah, welcome back. I understand you succeeded in finding and startling Riggy. May I see the three shock eggs?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Wonderful! Riggy had basketfuls of fun, and it was in no small part due to your superior startling skills. Now, if you could wait just a moment, Riggy has gone to fetch the others.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: We've found a wonderful new friend in Riggy, and it's thanks to you, Forename. His enthusiasm has been infectious, a gift to the festival, and I never dreamed─

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: <gasp> Could it be? Yes...yes it must! The gemstone I beheld in my dream, that the chocobo laid─it's none other than Riggy!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Wait, what!?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: The magnificent rock Riggy rides upon, the dazzling smiles upon the faces of those whose hearts he touched... Together they appear as a priceless gemstone. There can be no mistake.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Yet another vision has become reality, and I owe it to every one of you. But you most of all, Forename.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Ooh, that reminds me, our adventurer friend garnered a goodly haul of shock eggs!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: My word, look at all these! Such dedication calls for a special prize. The hovering egg─I want you to have it, Forename.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Wait, what!? Y-You can't be serious, Jihli! We poured our hearts into building the eggshilaration system, stayed up nights to make it flo─ Oh...

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Uwaaah! I didn't mean to say that out loud! N-No, wait, what I meant was─

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: The hovering egg is your handiwork? Why, that's incredible! You're a genius, Nonotta!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: You...like it? I-I thought you'd be upset that it's a contrivance rather than a gift from the Archons of old.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: The Archons work in mysterious ways, dear Nonotta. It was by their guidance, I believe, that you built the egg─an egg fit to serve as their vessel. I'm very proud of you.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: <sob> That means a lot to me, Jihli. Search as we might, we couldn't find a hovering egg. But with Hatching–tide fast approaching, we couldn't bear seeing you sad, and so...and so...

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Say no more, Nonotta. Know that I'm truly grateful for everything. And I certainly wouldn't dream of giving away your precious creation against your wishes. So I ask your permission to gift Forename the...eggshilaration system, you call it? As shehe who led us to the gemstone, I can think of none other more worthy to ride it.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: You have the right of it, Jihli! I would be honored if shehe were to ride it always!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: And you, Forename. You are a dear friend, as dear as─nay, dearer than a magnificent, dazzling gemstone.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: You've done much and more for us all, and the eggshilaration system is the least we can offer you in return. May it bear you to all you have ever dreamed!

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: It seems there was no hiding Riggy from you. If you have the three shock eggs, remember to show them to Nonotta.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I daresay things went well. Why, I could hear Riggy's laughter all the way here, and it put a smile on my face. If you've collected all three shock eggs, do hurry and show them to Nonotta.
